title: Appappa Lyrics Komban Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Komban Appappa Kaichal Song Lyrics
Singer(s): G.V. Prakash Kumar, Shreya Ghoshal
Music: GV Prakash

Appappa kaaichal vittu pochu
achchacho kadhal novu aaachu.
Muththathil paththu podum pechu.
moththathil enna kanju kaachu.

Paththiyatha murikkaadha unga kayyi
muppaazhil moodaambu  serthu vaiyyi.
oppaama neeyaaga setta seiyyi.

Vetkatha pakkam vandhu paathu
veeraappu pattu pattu pochu.
mallippu koondhal mondhu paathu
machcham un natchathiram aachu.

thappu thandaa seyyaadha
veeran thaandi.
unkitta nadappene
thapppaa thaandi.
oppaeththa maattendi kitta vadi

Veetula maththavanga
paakkaathappa seenduva.
paathutta samaalikka
yaedho onna nonduven.

Paarpaen appa paapaen
andha asattu srippathaan.
aaana edhirpaarpen
andha thiruttu thanathathaan.

Romba akkaraya
velayellaam paakkura.
ambuttum enna paakka
vaikkathaane seyyura.

Un kannu mattumthaandi
ada engo paakkudhu.
aana odambellaam enna
gun-naa thaakkudhu.

Appappa kaaichal vittu pochu
achchacho kadhal novu aaachu.

Sombula thanni mondu
melu koosa oothura.
nenjula saachi vachchi
mundhaanaya thuvattura

podhum idhu podhum
panju panjaa parakkuren.
nenjaa kulikkula
vandhu neechal adukkuren.

Sevvandhi nethimela
pachcha kuththi kaattuna
vellandhi nenju kaaraa
unna vannam theettuven.

Nooru jenmam podhadhaiyya
vaendi kenjuven.
Paasam anbil thaane
peththa thaaya minjuven.

Appappa kaaichal vittu pochu
achchacho kadhal novu aaachu.
Muththathil paththu podum pechu.
moththathil enna kanju kaachu.

Paththiyatha murikkaadha unga kayyi
muppaazhil moodaambu  serthu vaiyyi.
oppaama neeyaaga setta seiyyi.

Vetkatha pakkam vandhu paathu
veeraappu pattu pattu pochu.
